translations: n.自动售货机；[自] 自动机；自动贩卖式餐馆

sentences.sentence: Automats remained extremely popular throughout the 1920s and 1930s.
sentences.translation: 自动售货机仍然极受欢迎整个1920年代和1930年代。

sentences.sentence: Be in Japan, pass an any automats to be able to buy all sorts of clothbound tea drink.
sentences.translation: 在日本，通过任何一台自动售货机都可买到各种精装茶饮料。
